pageContent: Purpose: To evaluate the longevity and curability of patients with inoperable, Stage C, carcinomas of the prostate by means of external pelvic irradiation.

metaData.source:
A label-free photoelectrochemical immunosensor for prostate specific antigen detection based on Ag2S sensitized Ag/AgBr/BiOBr heterojunction by in-situ growth method
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34428614/
